CustomField.description: Maximum number of processing cycles (agent thinks -> agent acts) allowed for processing a single user message for this agent. If blank, uses the org-wide default from AI Agent Framework Settings. Each cycle counts as one turn (e.g., call model, use tool, call model again).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Per-agent limit on processing cycles. Prevents excessive processing for one user input. Leave blank to use org-wide default from AI Agent Framework Settings. Each agent action and follow-up LLM call counts as one cycle.
CustomField.label: Max Processing Cycles
